Welcome to mdream

mdream is a powerful tool for converting HTML to Markdown, with special features for generating llms.txt files.

Features

  • Fast HTML to Markdown conversion
  • llms.txt generation from HTML files
  • Streaming support for large files
  • Plugin system for customization
  • Performance optimized for V8

Installation

npm install -g mdream

Basic Usage

mdream llms "dist/**/*.html" --site-name "My Site" --description "My site description"

mdream is designed to be ultra-performant and optimized for LLM consumption.
